original_text: The name of the Midianite woman was Cozbi. She was the daughter of Zur. Zur was a leader of a Midianite clan.
korean_text: 죽임을 당한 미디안 여인의 이름은 고스비이니 수르의 딸이라 수르는 미디안 백성의 한 조상의 가문의 수령이었더라

sentences.original_text: The name of the Midianite woman was Cozbi.
She was the daughter of Zur.
Zur was a leader of a Midianite clan.
